short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A set of tools to be used by moderators on reddit in order to make their jobs easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toolbox is an extension that adds a myriad of much needed features and functionality to reddit for moderators.

Containing: 
- Queuetools
- Mod Button
- Mod Mail Pro
- Mod Domain Tagger
- Toolbox Notifier
- User history analyzer
- Comment Nuke tool
- User notes
- Personal notes
- Syntax highlighter for subreddit css
- Much more

https://www.reddit.com/r/toolbox
